variations.description: Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for 270% of ATK.
Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for 315% of ATK.
Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for 360% of ATK.
Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for 405% of ATK.
Generates 1 Order Energy and heals all allies for 450% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 18% for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 315% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 21% for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 360% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 24% for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 405% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 27% for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 450% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 30% for 10s.

When Mikoto takes damage, there is a 20% chance to place a Soul Shield that absorbs damage equal to 25% of Mikoto's max Health on the Doll with the lowest Health for 5s. Can only trigger once every 10s.

When Mikoto takes damage, there is a 40% chance to place a Soul Shield that absorbs damage equal to 25% of Mikoto's max Health on the Doll with the lowest Health for 5s. Can only trigger once every 10s.
